name: Ring of Destruction
description: A ring containing a fragment of Plagg's destructive power.
plaggCommentary: Hey! Where did you get that? That's mine! ...Fine, you can borrow it.

name: Charm of Creation
description: A charm blessed by Tikki's creative energy.
plaggCommentary: Ugh, Tikki's stuff. Too much positivity for my taste. But it's powerful, I'll give her that.

name: Relic of the First Heroes
description: An artifact from the age when heroes first wielded Miraculous.
plaggCommentary: Old stuff! I remember when this was new. Good times... lots of cheese back then too.

name: Crystal of Infinite Chaos
description: A crystal containing the raw essence of chaos itself.
plaggCommentary: Now THIS is my kind of artifact! Pure, beautiful chaos! Just like my eating habits!

name: Pendant of Temporal Mastery
description: An artifact that grants limited control over time itself.
plaggCommentary: Time control! I could go back and eat all the cheese throughout history!

effect.description: Can act twice per turn once per battle
